name: ColorCoder
0:
”Alexa, ask Color Coder to tell me the hex value of fuchsia”
”What is the value of salmon”
”What is spring green”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color coder
des: You can ask Color Coder to convert an HTML color name to its hexadecimal representation. This is especially useful for UI developers!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
